0.text: After dressing up my appearance as much as humanly possible, I perused through my fridge for anything edible.

1.speaker: Me
1.text: My stomach growled with a low intensity but I knew it was going to get stronger the more I woke up.

2.speaker: Me
2.text: Unfortunately, I could only see some rancid milk and moldy bread.

3.speaker: Me
3.text: How long had it been since I last cleaned out the fridge? It couldn't have been more than a week? Or could it?

5.speaker: Me
5.text: I put the poor state of the fridge to the back of my mind and rushed out the door with nothing but my hastily thrown on business clothes and a briefcase, returning home briefly to fetch my phone.
